section-intro-netsetup: Select your preferred payment method and we'll text you on 0400 777 333 a few days before your payment is due. Just reply 'Pay' and we'll deduct your payment on the due date.
Chat now to update your mobile number.

account-attribute.att-description: We'll send SMS Pay text’s to your mobile number 040 333 777.

section-intro-netsetup-hd: Paying your bills has never been easier
section-intro-netsetup-body: Select your preferred payment method and we'll text you on 0400 777 333 a few days before your payment is due. Just reply 'Pay' and we'll deduct your payment on the due date.
section-intro-netsetup-updateNo: Chat now to update your mobile number.
section-intro-netsetup-details:
[icon] SMS Pay will be setup for your Electricty and Gas accounts.

 

[icon] Payment will be never processed without you replying "Pay".

 

[icon] Your bills will still be delivered as per your current arrangement.
wallet-disclaimer: [icon] Setting up SMS Pay with your bank account or credit card will save your payment method to My Wallet. Easy to manage, fast to find.
